comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Feb 21, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0DE3DE123FE233A... indicated that exercises would be held that day at Peekskill, NY. Participating was Company F of the 71st Regiment and faculty and students of the New York School of the Line. Several of these officers are mentioned in the piece.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Lt. Col. W. S Terriberry, according to NYT
